word_mean: 受体，受器，受者：可与另一种物质相结合之物质，尤指在氧化还原反应中与氢或氧结合使反应得以进行之物质。参见donor
接受体指血中的高密度脂蛋白,能将肝外细胞的胆固醇从该细胞内移出并运送给肝细胞,由肝细胞转化为胆汁酸后排出。

sentence.Network_en: In aerobic systems, oxygen is the terminal electron acceptor and is reduced.
sentence.Network_cn: 在需氧体系中, 氧是末端电子接受体并且被还原.

sentence.Network_en: The reverse of Reaction 11 for acetate may be combined with the electron acceptor reactions.
sentence.Network_cn: 对于醋酸盐、反应11的逆反应可以与电子接受体反应组合在一起.

sentence.Network_en: During alcoholic fermentation acetaldehyde acts as a hydrogen acceptor instead of oxygen.
sentence.Network_cn: 在这个过程中乙醛取代了氧作为氢的受体.

荧光受体（acceptor）：指在荧光团受到激光激发时，能发出特定波长的发射光的基团。HTRF®的能量受体均可为XL665和d2。

acceptor 受主acceptor center 受中心acceptor impurity 受钟质
acceptor 受主acceptor atom 受汁子acceptor center 受中心
...于反应中心色素分子是光化学反应中最先向原初电子受体供给电子的，因此反应中心色素分子又称原初电子供体。30．电子受体(electron acceptor)在氧化还原反应中接受电子的反应物，即一种氧化剂，如NAD+、NADP+等。.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Anglo-Norman French acceptour, from Latin acceptor; replaced by later accepter (see accept)in general use, but retained in specialist use

means.word_mean: 1. (chemistry) in the formation of a coordinate bond it is the compound to which electrons are donated
2. the person (or institution) who accepts a check or draft and becomes responsible for paying the party named in the draft when it matures

auth_sentence.content: In this model, the receptor switches on when an electron hops from donor to acceptor.
auth_sentence.res_content: In this model, the receptor switches on when an electron hops from donor to acceptor.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In this model, the receptor switches on when an electron hops from donor to acceptor.
